# üçí Cherry Studio Cherry Studio es un cliente de escritorio que soporta m√∫ltiples proveedores de LLM, disponible en Windows, Mac y Linux. üëè √önete al [Grupo de Telegram](https://t.me/CherryStudioAI)ÔΩú[Discord](https://discord.gg/wez8HtpxqQ) | [Grupo QQ(575014769)](https://qm.qq.com/q/lo0D4qVZKi) ‚ù§Ô∏è ¬øTe gusta Cherry Studio? ¬°Dale una estrella üåü o [Patrocina](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/CherryHQ/cherry-studio/main/docs/sponsor.md) para apoyar el desarrollo! # üå† Capturas de pantalla ![](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/36dddb2c-e0fb-4a5f-9411-91447bab6e18) ![](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/f549e8a0-2385-40b4-b52b-2039e39f2930) ![](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/58e0237c-4d36-40de-b428-53051d982026) # üåü Caracter√≠sticas clave 1. **Soporte de Diversos Proveedores de LLM**: - ‚òÅÔ∏è Principales Servicios Cloud LLM: OpenAI, Gemini, Anthropic y m√°s - üîó Integraci√≥n con Servicios Web de IA: Claude, Peplexity, Poe y otros - üíª Soporte de Modelos Locales con Ollama, LM Studio 2. **Asistentes de IA y Conversaciones**: - üìö M√°s de 300 Asistentes de IA Preconfigurados - ü§ñ Creaci√≥n de Asistentes Personalizados - üí¨ Conversaciones Simult√°neas Multi-modelo 3. **Procesamiento de Documentos y Datos**: - üìÑ Soporta texto, im√°genes, Office, PDF y m√°s - ‚òÅÔ∏è Gesti√≥n y respaldo de archivos WebDAV - üìä Visualizaci√≥n de gr√°ficos Mermaid - üíª Resaltado de sintaxis de c√≥digo

4. **Practical Tools Integration**:

- üîç Global Search Functionality

- üîå Mini Program Support

5. **Enhanced User Experience**:

- üñ•Ô∏è Cross-platform Support for Windows, Mac, and Linux
- üì¶ Ready to Use - No Environment Setup Required
- üé® Light/Dark Themes and Transparent Window
- üìù Complete Markdown Rendering
- ü§≤ Easy Content Sharing

# üìù Roadmap

We're actively working on the following features and improvements:

1. üéØ **Core Features**

- Selection Assistant with smart content selection enhancement
- Deep Research with advanced research capabilities
- Memory System with global context awareness
- Document Preprocessing with improved document handling
- MCP Marketplace for Model Context Protocol ecosystem

2. üóÇ **Knowledge Management**

- Notes and Collections
- Dynamic Canvas visualization
- OCR capabilities
- TTS (Text-to-Speech) support

3. üì± **Platform Support**

- HarmonyOS Edition (PC)
- Android App (Phase 1)
- iOS App (Phase 1)
- Multi-Window support
- Window Pinning functionality

4. üîå **Advanced Features**

- Plugin System
- ASR (Automatic Speech Recognition)
- Assistant and Topic Interaction Refactoring

Track our progress and contribute on our [project board](https://github.com/orgs/CherryHQ/projects/7).

Want to influence our roadmap? Join our [GitHub Discussions](https://github.com/CherryHQ/cherry-studio/discussions) to share your ideas and feedback!

Welcome PR for more themes

# ü§ù Contributing

We welcome contributions to Cherry Studio! Here are some ways you can contribute:

1. **Contribute Code**: Develop new features or optimize existing code.
2. **Fix Bugs**: Submit fixes for any bugs you find.
3. **Maintain Issues**: Help manage GitHub issues.
4. **Product Design**: Participate in design discussions.
5. **Write Documentation**: Improve user manuals and guides.
6. **Community Engagement**: Join discussions and help users.
7. **Promote Usage**: Spread the word about Cherry Studio.

Refer to the [Branching Strategy](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/CherryHQ/cherry-studio/main/docs/branching-strategy-en.md) for contribution guidelines

## Getting Started

1. **Fork the Repository**: Fork and clone it to your local machine.
2. **Create a Branch**: For your changes.
3. **Submit Changes**: Commit and push your changes.
4. **Open a Pull Request**: Describe your changes and reasons.

For more detailed guidelines, please refer to our [Contributing Guide](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/CherryHQ/cherry-studio/main/CONTRIBUTING.md).

Thank you for your support and contributions!

# üîß Developer Co-creation Program

We are launching the Cherry Studio Developer Co-creation Program to foster a healthy and positive-feedback loop within the open-source ecosystem. We believe that great software is built collaboratively, and every merged pull request breathes new life into the project.

We sincerely invite you to join our ranks of contributors and shape the future of Cherry Studio with us.

## Contributor Rewards Program

To give back to our core contributors and create a virtuous cycle, we have established the following long-term incentive plan.

**The inaugural tracking period for this program will be Q3 2025 (July, August, September). Rewards for this cycle will be distributed on October 1st.**

# ü§ù Contribuir

¬°Damos la bienvenida a contribuciones para Cherry Studio! Aqu√≠ hay algunas formas en que puedes ayudar:

1. **Contribuir C√≥digo**: Desarrolla nuevas funciones u optimiza el c√≥digo existente.
2. **Corregir Errores**: Env√≠a correcciones para cualquier error que encuentres.
3. **Gestionar Issues**: Ayuda a manejar los issues de GitHub.
4. **Dise√±o de Producto**: Participa en discusiones de dise√±o.
5. **Redactar Documentaci√≥n**: Mejora los manuales y gu√≠as de usuario.
6. **Participaci√≥n Comunitaria**: √önete a discusiones y ayuda a los usuarios.
7. **Promover el Uso**: Difunde Cherry Studio.

Consulta la [Estrategia de Ramas](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/CherryHQ/cherry-studio/main/docs/branching-strategy-en.md) para las directrices de contribuci√≥n

## Comenzando

1. **Haz Fork al Repositorio**: Haz fork y cl√≥nalo en tu m√°quina local.
2. **Crea una Rama**: Para tus cambios.
3. **Env√≠a tus Cambios**: Haz commit y push de tus cambios.
4. **Abre un Pull Request**: Describe tus cambios y motivos.

Para pautas m√°s detalladas, consulta nuestra [Gu√≠a de Contribuci√≥n](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/CherryHQ/cherry-studio/main/CONTRIBUTING.md).

¬°Gracias por tu apoyo y contribuciones!

# üîß Programa de Co-creaci√≥n para Desarrolladores

Estamos lanzando el Programa de Co-creaci√≥n para Desarrolladores de Cherry Studio para fomentar un ciclo saludable y de retroalimentaci√≥n positiva dentro del ecosistema open-source. Creemos que el gran software se construye colaborativamente, y cada pull request fusionado da nueva vida al proyecto.

Te invitamos sinceramente a unirte a nuestras filas de contribuidores y construir juntos el futuro de Cherry Studio.

## Programa de Recompensas para Contribuidores

Para retribuir a nuestros contribuyentes clave y crear un ciclo virtuoso, hemos establecido el siguiente plan de incentivos a largo plazo.

**El primer per√≠odo de seguimiento para este programa ser√° el Q3 2025 (julio, agosto, septiembre). Las recompensas de este ciclo se distribuir√°n el 1 de octubre.**

Content:
Within any tracking period (e.g., July 1st to September 30th for the first cycle), any developer who contributes more than **30 meaningful commits** to any of Cherry Studio's open-source projects on GitHub will be eligible for the following benefits: - **Cursor Subscription Sponsorship**: Receive a **$70 USD** credit or reimbursement for your [Cursor](https://cursor.sh/) subscription, making AI your most efficient coding partner. - **Unlimited Model Access**: Get **unlimited** API calls for the **DeepSeek** and **Qwen** models. - **Cutting-Edge Tech Access**: Enjoy occasional perks, including API access to models like **Claude**, **Gemini**, and **OpenAI**, keeping you at the forefront of technology. ## Growing Together & Future Plans A vibrant community is the driving force behind any sustainable open-source project. As Cherry Studio grows, so will our rewards program. We are committed to continuously aligning our benefits with the best-in-class tools and resources in the industry. This ensures our core contributors receive meaningful support, creating a positive cycle where developers, the community, and the project grow together. **Moving forward, the project will also embrace an increasingly open stance to give back to the entire open-source community.** ## How to Get Started? We look forward to your first Pull Request! You can start by exploring our repositories, picking up a `good first issue`, or proposing your own enhancements. Every commit is a testament to the spirit of open source. Thank you for your interest and contributions. Let's build together. # üè¢ Enterprise Edition Building on the Community Edition, we are proud to introduce **Cherry Studio Enterprise Edition**‚Äîa privately-deployable AI productivity and management platform designed for modern teams and enterprises. The Enterprise Edition addresses core challenges in team collaboration by centralizing the management of AI resources, knowledge, and data. It empowers organizations to enhance efficiency, foster innovation, and ensure compliance, all while maintaining 100% control over their data in a secure environment. ## Core Advantages - **Unified Model Management**: Centrally integrate and manage various cloud-based LLMs (e.g., OpenAI, Anthropic, Google Gemini) and locally deployed private models. Employees can use them out-of-the-box without individual configuration. - **Enterprise-Grade Knowledge Base**: Build, manage, and share team-wide knowledge bases. Ensures knowledge retention and consistency, enabling team members to interact with AI based on unified and accurate information. - **Fine-Grained Access Control**: Easily manage employee accounts and assign role-based permissions for different models, knowledge bases, and features through a unified admin backend. - **Fully Private Deployment**: Deploy the entire backend service on your on-premises servers or private cloud, ensuring your data remains 100% private and under your control to meet the strictest security and compliance standards. - **Reliable Backend Services**: Provides stable API services and enterprise-grade data backup and recovery mechanisms to ensure business continuity. ## ‚ú® Online Demo > üöß **Public Beta Notice** > > The Enterprise Edition is currently in its early public beta stage, and we are actively iterating and optimizing its features. We are aware that it may not be perfectly stable yet. If you encounter any issues or have valuable suggestions during your trial, we would be very grateful if you could contact us via email to provide feedback. **üîó [Cherry Studio Enterprise](https://www.cherry-ai.com/enterprise)** ## Version Comparison | Feature | Community Edition | Enterprise Edition | | :---------------- | :----------------------------------------- | :-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | | **Open Source** | ‚úÖ Yes | ‚≠ïÔ∏è Partially released to customers | | **Cost** | Free for Personal Use / Commercial License | Buyout / Subscription Fee | | **Admin Backend** | ‚Äî | ‚óè Centralized **Model** Access
‚óè **Employee** Management
‚óè Shared **Knowledge Base**
‚óè **Access** Control
‚óè **Data** Backup | | **Server** | ‚Äî | ‚úÖ Dedicated Private Deployment | ## Get the Enterprise Edition We believe the Enterprise Edition will become your team's AI productivity engine. If you are interested in Cherry Studio Enterprise Edition and would like to learn more, request a quote, or schedule a demo, please feel free to contact us. - **For Business Inquiries & Purchasing**: **üìß [bd@cherry-ai.com](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/CherryHQ/cherry-studio/main/mailto:bd@cherry-ai.com)** # üîó Related Projects - [one-api](https://github.com/songquanpeng/one-api): LLM API management and distribution system supporting mainstream models like OpenAI, Azure, and Anthropic. Features a unified API interface, suitable for key management and secondary distribution. - [ublacklist](https://github.com/iorate/ublacklist): Blocks specific sites from appearing in Google search results # üöÄ Contributors

A medida que Cherry Studio crece, tambi√©n lo har√° nuestro programa de recompensas. Nos comprometemos a alinear continuamente nuestros beneficios con las mejores herramientas y recursos de la industria. Esto garantiza que nuestros principales contribuyentes reciban un apoyo significativo, creando un ciclo positivo donde los desarrolladores, la comunidad y el proyecto crecen juntos. **De cara al futuro, el proyecto adoptar√° una postura cada vez m√°s abierta para retribuir a toda la comunidad open-source.** ## ¬øC√≥mo Comenzar? ¬°Esperamos tu primer Pull Request! Puedes empezar explorando nuestros repositorios, eligiendo un `good first issue` o proponiendo tus propias mejoras. Cada commit es un testimonio del esp√≠ritu open-source. Gracias por tu inter√©s y contribuciones. Construyamos juntos. # üè¢ Edici√≥n Empresarial Sobre la base de la Edici√≥n Comunitaria, nos enorgullece presentar **Cherry Studio Enterprise Edition**‚Äîuna plataforma de productividad y gesti√≥n de IA desplegable de forma privada, dise√±ada para equipos y empresas modernas. La Edici√≥n Empresarial aborda los principales retos de la colaboraci√≥n en equipo centralizando la gesti√≥n de recursos, conocimientos y datos de IA. Permite a las organizaciones mejorar la eficiencia, fomentar la innovaci√≥n y garantizar el cumplimiento, manteniendo el 100% del control sobre sus datos en un entorno seguro. ## Ventajas Principales - **Gesti√≥n Unificada de Modelos**: Integra y administra de forma centralizada varios LLMs en la nube (por ejemplo, OpenAI, Anthropic, Google Gemini) y modelos privados desplegados localmente. Los empleados pueden usarlos sin configuraci√≥n individual. - **Base de Conocimientos de Nivel Empresarial**: Crea, administra y comparte bases de conocimiento a nivel de equipo. Garantiza retenci√≥n y coherencia, permitiendo que los miembros interact√∫en con la IA con informaci√≥n unificada y precisa. - **Control de Acceso Granular**: Gestiona f√°cilmente cuentas de empleados y asigna permisos basados en roles para distintos modelos, bases de datos de conocimiento y funciones desde un backend de administraci√≥n unificado. - **Despliegue Totalmente Privado**: Despliega todo el servicio backend en tus propios servidores o nube privada, asegurando que tus datos permanezcan 100% privados y bajo tu control para cumplir los est√°ndares m√°s estrictos de seguridad y cumplimiento. - **Servicios Backend Confiables**: Ofrece servicios API estables y mecanismos de respaldo y recuperaci√≥n de datos de nivel empresarial para garantizar la continuidad operativa. ## ‚ú® Demo Online > üöß **Aviso de Beta P√∫blica** > > La Edici√≥n Empresarial se encuentra actualmente en su etapa inicial de beta p√∫blica, y estamos iterando y optimizando activamente sus funciones. Sabemos que a√∫n puede no ser completamente estable. Si encuentras alg√∫n problema o tienes sugerencias valiosas durante la prueba, agradecer√≠amos mucho que nos contactaras por correo electr√≥nico para darnos tu feedback. **üîó [Cherry Studio Enterprise](https://www.cherry-ai.com/enterprise)** ## Comparaci√≥n de Versiones | Caracter√≠stica | Edici√≥n Comunitaria | Edici√≥n Empresarial | | :----------------------- | :------------------------------------------- | :-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | | **Open Source** | ‚úÖ S√≠ | ‚≠ïÔ∏è Parcialmente liberada a clientes | | **Costo** | Gratis para uso personal / Licencia comercial | Compra / Suscripci√≥n | | **Backend de Admin** | ‚Äî | ‚óè Acceso centralizado a **Modelos**

RowTranslations.originContent: Within any tracking period (e.g., July 1st to September 30th for the first cycle), any developer who contributes more than **30 meaningful commits** to any of Cherry Studio's open-source projects on GitHub will be eligible for the following benefits:
RowTranslations.translatedContent: Dentro de cualquier periodo de seguimiento (por ejemplo, del 1 de julio al 30 de septiembre para el primer ciclo), cualquier desarrollador que aporte m√°s de **30 commits significativos** a cualquiera de los proyectos open-source de Cherry Studio en GitHub ser√° elegible para los siguientes beneficios:

RowTranslations.originContent: - **Cursor Subscription Sponsorship**: Receive a **$70 USD** credit or reimbursement for your [Cursor](https://cursor.sh/) subscription, making AI your most efficient coding partner.
RowTranslations.translatedContent: - **Patrocinio de Suscripci√≥n a Cursor**: Recibe un cr√©dito o reembolso de **$70 USD** para tu suscripci√≥n a [Cursor](https://cursor.sh/), haciendo de la IA tu socio de codificaci√≥n m√°s eficiente.

RowTranslations.originContent: - **Unlimited Model Access**: Get **unlimited** API calls for the **DeepSeek** and **Qwen** models.
RowTranslations.translatedContent: - **Acceso Ilimitado a Modelos**: Obt√©n **llamadas API ilimitadas** para los modelos **DeepSeek** y **Qwen**.

RowTranslations.originContent: - **Cutting-Edge Tech Access**: Enjoy occasional perks, including API access to models like **Claude**, **Gemini**, and **OpenAI**, keeping you at the forefront of technology.
RowTranslations.translatedContent: - **Acceso a Tecnolog√≠a de Punta**: Disfruta de beneficios ocasionales, incluido el acceso API a modelos como **Claude**, **Gemini** y **OpenAI**, manteni√©ndote a la vanguardia tecnol√≥gica.

RowTranslations.originContent: A vibrant community is the driving force behind any sustainable open-source project. As Cherry Studio grows, so will our rewards program. We are committed to continuously aligning our benefits with the best-in-class tools and resources in the industry. This ensures our core contributors receive meaningful support, creating a positive cycle where developers, the community, and the project grow together.
RowTranslations.translatedContent: Una comunidad vibrante es la fuerza impulsora detr√°s de cualquier proyecto open-source sostenible. A medida que Cherry Studio crece, tambi√©n lo har√° nuestro programa de recompensas. Nos comprometemos a alinear continuamente nuestros beneficios con las mejores herramientas y recursos de la industria. Esto garantiza que nuestros principales contribuyentes reciban un apoyo significativo, creando un ciclo positivo donde los desarrolladores, la comunidad y el proyecto crecen juntos.

RowTranslations.originContent: **Moving forward, the project will also embrace an increasingly open stance to give back to the entire open-source community.**
RowTranslations.translatedContent: **De cara al futuro, el proyecto adoptar√° una postura cada vez m√°s abierta para retribuir a toda la comunidad open-source.**

RowTranslations.originContent: We look forward to your first Pull Request!
You can start by exploring our repositories, picking up a `good first issue`, or proposing your own enhancements. Every commit is a testament to the spirit of open source.
RowTranslations.translatedContent: Puedes empezar explorando nuestros repositorios, eligiendo un `good first issue` o proponiendo tus propias mejoras. Cada commit es un testimonio del esp√≠ritu open-source.

RowTranslations.originContent: Thank you for your interest and contributions.
RowTranslations.translatedContent: Gracias por tu inter√©s y contribuciones.

RowTranslations.originContent: Building on the Community Edition, we are proud to introduce **Cherry Studio Enterprise Edition**‚Äîa privately-deployable AI productivity and management platform designed for modern teams and enterprises.
RowTranslations.translatedContent: Sobre la base de la Edici√≥n Comunitaria, nos enorgullece presentar **Cherry Studio Enterprise Edition**‚Äîuna plataforma de productividad y gesti√≥n de IA desplegable de forma privada, dise√±ada para equipos y empresas modernas.

RowTranslations.originContent: The Enterprise Edition addresses core challenges in team collaboration by centralizing the management of AI resources, knowledge, and data. It empowers organizations to enhance efficiency, foster innovation, and ensure compliance, all while maintaining 100% control over their data in a secure environment.
RowTranslations.translatedContent: La Edici√≥n Empresarial aborda los principales retos de la colaboraci√≥n en equipo centralizando la gesti√≥n de recursos, conocimientos y datos de IA. Permite a las organizaciones mejorar la eficiencia, fomentar la innovaci√≥n y garantizar el cumplimiento, manteniendo el 100% del control sobre sus datos en un entorno seguro.

RowTranslations.originContent: - **Unified Model Management**: Centrally integrate and manage various cloud-based LLMs (e.g., OpenAI, Anthropic, Google Gemini) and locally deployed private models. Employees can use them out-of-the-box without individual configuration.
RowTranslations.translatedContent: - **Gesti√≥n Unificada de Modelos**: Integra y administra de forma centralizada varios LLMs en la nube (por ejemplo, OpenAI, Anthropic, Google Gemini) y modelos privados desplegados localmente. Los empleados pueden usarlos sin configuraci√≥n individual.

RowTranslations.originContent: - **Enterprise-Grade Knowledge Base**: Build, manage, and share team-wide knowledge bases. Ensures knowledge retention and consistency, enabling team members to interact with AI based on unified and accurate information.
RowTranslations.translatedContent: - **Base de Conocimientos de Nivel Empresarial**: Crea, administra y comparte bases de conocimiento a nivel de equipo. Garantiza retenci√≥n y coherencia, permitiendo que los miembros interact√∫en con la IA con informaci√≥n unificada y precisa.

RowTranslations.originContent: - **Fine-Grained Access Control**: Easily manage employee accounts and assign role-based permissions for different models, knowledge bases, and features through a unified admin backend.
RowTranslations.translatedContent: - **Control de Acceso Granular**: Gestiona f√°cilmente cuentas de empleados y asigna permisos basados en roles para distintos modelos, bases de datos de conocimiento y funciones desde un backend de administraci√≥n unificado.

RowTranslations.originContent: - **Fully Private Deployment**: Deploy the entire backend service on your on-premises servers or private cloud, ensuring your data remains 100% private and under your control to meet the strictest security and compliance standards.
RowTranslations.translatedContent: - **Despliegue Totalmente Privado**: Despliega todo el servicio backend en tus propios servidores o nube privada, asegurando que tus datos permanezcan 100% privados y bajo tu control para cumplir los est√°ndares m√°s estrictos de seguridad y cumplimiento.

RowTranslations.originContent: - **Reliable Backend Services**: Provides stable API services and enterprise-grade data backup and recovery mechanisms to ensure business continuity.
RowTranslations.translatedContent: - **Servicios Backend Confiables**: Ofrece servicios API estables y mecanismos de respaldo y recuperaci√≥n de datos de nivel empresarial para garantizar la continuidad operativa.

RowTranslations.originContent: > The Enterprise Edition is currently in its early public beta stage, and we are actively iterating and optimizing its features. We are aware that it may not be perfectly stable yet. If you encounter any issues or have valuable suggestions during your trial, we would be very grateful if you could contact us via email to provide feedback.
RowTranslations.translatedContent: > La Edici√≥n Empresarial se encuentra actualmente en su etapa inicial de beta p√∫blica, y estamos iterando y optimizando activamente sus funciones. Sabemos que a√∫n puede no ser completamente estable. Si encuentras alg√∫n problema o tienes sugerencias valiosas durante la prueba, agradecer√≠amos mucho que nos contactaras por correo electr√≥nico para darnos tu feedback.

RowTranslations.originContent: We believe the Enterprise Edition will become your team's AI productivity engine. If you are interested in Cherry Studio Enterprise Edition and would like to learn more, request a quote, or schedule a demo, please feel free to contact us.
RowTranslations.translatedContent: Creemos que la Edici√≥n Empresarial ser√° el motor de productividad en IA de tu equipo. Si te interesa Cherry Studio Enterprise Edition y deseas obtener m√°s informaci√≥n, solicitar una cotizaci√≥n o agendar una demo, no dudes en contactarnos.

RowTranslations.originContent: - [one-api](https://github.com/songquanpeng/one-api): LLM API management and distribution system supporting mainstream models like OpenAI, Azure, and Anthropic. Features a unified API interface, suitable for key management and secondary distribution.

Ofrece una interfaz API unificada, ideal para gesti√≥n de claves y distribuci√≥n secundaria.
